price: Poslat ću im jedan dar i vidjet ću sa čim će se izaslanici vratiti.”
arabic: وَإِنِّي مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡهِم بِهَدِيَّةٖ فَنَاظِرَةُۢ بِمَ يَرۡجِعُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-innī mur'silatun ilayhim bihadiyyatin fanāẓiratun bima yarjiʿu al-mur'salūna
